name: OSF-Standard Pre-Data Collection Registration
description: You will be asked if data collection is underway and if you have looked at your data already. You will be provided an opportunity to post other comments about your project.

questions.title: Data collection status
options: No, data collection has not begun
Yes, data collection is underway or complete
questions.description: Has data collection begun for this project?

questions.title: Data access status
questions.description: Have you looked at the data?
